org.jcvi.jillion.sam.attribute

Class ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.sam.attribute.ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder

  • public class ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder
extends Object
    ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder builds a SamAttributeValidator that calls several other SamAttributeValidators in a chain. If a validator "passes" an attribute, then the next validator in the chain gets called etc. The attribute only passes the chained validator if all the validators in the chain also pass the attribute. If any validator throws an exception, then that exception is thrown by the chain and no other validators in the chain are called.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder

        public ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder()
        Convenience constructor same as new ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder(true).
        See Also:
        ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder(boolean)

      • ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder

        public ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder(boolean validateReservedAttributes)
        Create a new ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder instance.
        Parameters:
        validateReservedAttributes - should the rules for the ReservedSamAttributeKeys specified in the SAM format be checked. If true, then the first SamAttributeValidator in the chain will check to make sure the values in the attributes meet the requirements specified in the SAM format specification.

    • Method Detail

      • addValidator

        public ChainedSamAttributeValidatorBuilder addValidator(SamAttributeValidator validator)
        Add the given SamAttributeValidator to the end of the chain.
        Parameters:
        validator - the SamAttributeValidator to add; can not be null.
        Returns:
        this.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if validator is null.

      • build

        public SamAttributeValidator build()
        Create a new SamAttributeValidator instance that will delegate to all the validators in the chain so far.
        Returns:
        a new SamAttributeValidator instance; will never be null.
